name: 18 Wheels of Steel: Convoy
description: Take the wheel of a fast paced, high intensity trucking business. Start as a one man show, bidding on jobs, then build your fleet into an unstoppable convoy and deliver the goods. Grow your business and your fleet, but beware - your reputation is everything.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows: Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce FX5700, ATI Radeon 9600, Intel GMA X3000 or better (requires TnL and Shader Model 2.0 support) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows: Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 3.1 GHz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce FX5700, ATI Radeon 9600, Intel GMA X3000 or better (requires TnL and Shader Model 2.0 support) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
